subsection.name: Description
subsection.div: Check that the default is after all the cases in a switch statement.
subsection.p: Rationale: Java allows default anywhere within the switch statement. But it is more readable if it comes after the last case.

tr.td: Control whether to allow default along with case if they are not last.
